mapper.sql: tcd.id AS id, tcd.esname AS esname, tcd.cnname AS cnname, tcd.categories_id AS categoriesId, tcg.name AS categoriesName, tcd.sku AS sku, tcd.spu AS spu, tcd.stock AS stock, tcd.title AS title, tcd.discount_price AS discountPrice, origin_price AS originPrice, tcd.color AS color, tcd.product_size AS productSize, weight, tcd.package_size AS packageSize, tcd.brands AS brands, tcd.desc AS `desc`, tcd.supplier_id AS supplierId, tsp.cnname AS supplierCnName, tsp.esname AS supplierEsName, tsp.sku AS supplierSku, tsp.phone AS supplierPhone, tcd.purchase_price AS purchasePrice, tcd.picture_id AS pictureId, tcd.createtime AS createtime, tcd.updatetime AS updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_commodity tcd LEFT JOIN tbl_categories tcg ON tcd.categories_id = tcg.id LEFT JOIN tbl_supplier tsp ON tcd.supplier_id = tsp.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND tcd.cnname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') OR tcd.esname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND tcg.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{categoriesName},'%')
and (tcd.updatetime between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'))
limit 0, #{rowNum}
select ( CASE tc.cnname WHEN (tc.cnname IS NULL) THEN tc.esname ELSE tc.cnname END ) AS commodityName from tbl_commodity tc where tc.id IN (#{ids})
